I would have sponsored several installations on different hives!
That sounds amazing! What’s holding you back? We'd love to hear your thoughts. :-)
Which manufacturer do you use for weighing sensors? Weighing sensors must be stable.

Great question! We're currently testing multiple load cell manufacturers to ensure the best stability and accuracy for long-term hive monitoring. We haven't finalized our choice yet, but reliability is our top priority. We'll share more details once we've made the final selection!
Do you have any recommendations based on your experience? We'd love to hear your insights!
How many hives/sensors can be managed by a single Link?
Dear Isbrand,
In our latest setup, we have 10 sensors running stable with a single Link. This number could potentially be increased in the future, but it will require further testing and development.
Regards
Will there be a monthly or yearly fee to access our data from the sensors?
There will be no fee to access your own data.
Hi, I have a few questions.
1.Are both the sensors necessary for monitoring one hive? Or can we also choose for just the internal sensor?
The reason I ask is because I have a system with paws for my hives that prevent ants from coming in.
2.Do you continue to add software functions to the system in the future?
3.Is the software opensource?
4.Is there a possibility to compare your hives with other hives from other users to see trends?
Hi Thomas,
Thank you for your questions!
1.) No, you do not need to use the weight sensor if you don't want to. You can also just go for the HIIVE Link Basestation and then add the internal sensors (Sens Sensor) as needed.

2.) Yes, we will continue to add new features for sure. We already have a backlog of features that we find interesting, but we will, of course, also listen to your needs and ideas to develop the system further.
3.) No, the software is not open source.
4.) That's a great idea and something we already have in mind. Our goal is to build a community, and this would be a great feature for sure! However, it is not implemented at the moment.
Best
Team HIIVE
